pullRequest.title: Centralize versioning for resource manager libraries
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR contains the following changes

Addition of resource manager libraries to eng/versionining/version_client.txt
Modification of the pom file version scanner to add the additional resource manager groupId (com.azure.resourcemanager) used to wildcard a groupId for the enforcer plugin.
Modification of all resource-manager libraries to parent off of azure-client-sdk-parent instead of azure-resourcemanager-parent. This includes version tagging for all dependencies and plugins. Note: sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-parent/pom.xml was not deleted as part of this PR. It was left for reference purposes and should be deleted as part of Resource Manager library adjustments for azure-client-sdk-parent parentage
Addition of missing README.md files for all resource manager libraries.
Addition of build plugin configuration for maven-enforcer-plugin in the libraries that required it.
Set low min jacoco numbers in the properties.
Added all resourcemanager libraries to eng/jacoco-test-coverage

It's worth noting that each and every resource manager library's pom file has the following entries for the build/plugin configuration for maven-compiler-plugin:
                   <!-- RMfailOnWarning set to false in azure-resourcemanager-parent's definition, set here to allow compilation but should be using the azure-client-sdk-parent's setting which is true --> <failOnWarning>false</failOnWarning>
                  <!-- RMshowDeprecation set in azure-resourcemanager-parent but not in azure-client-sdk-parent --> <showDeprecation>true</showDeprecation>
failOnWarning of false was one of the settings inherited from the azure-resourcemanager-parent, azure-client-sdk-parent has this as true. The expectation is that this should be turned off and using azure-client-sdk-parent's setting which is to fail on warning. Right now, turning this off will cause builds to fail as there's a lot of warnings. From what I can tell most of these existed prior to my changes.

commit.message: centralize versioning for resource manager libraries

nodes.bodyText: @srnagar we'd chatted about this earlier. For right now I've opted to leave both of these entries in here. I'm going to add the "RMDocs" as one of the searchable tags that you'll be looking at as part of Resource Manager library adjustments for azure-client-sdk-parent parentage
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -529,6 +530,9 @@
             <excludePackageNames>
               *.impl*:
               *.implementation*:
+              <!-- RMDocs do utils and samples actually do anything -->
+              *.utils:
+              *.samples

commit.message: Set low min coverage and add RM libs to Jacoco
